Text: Out of Office AutoReply Option Income on Pay StubPST I am away from the office until January If you need emergency assistance please contact Dawn Doucet

RE Stock Option Value On Pay StubPST Chris this is a yearend adjustment that will be done for your T prior to processing them Your final pay stub will stay the same as I cannot go back and reissue those Im going to use the K number we have record of and adjust the balance down thanks Tricia Original Message From Dorland Chris Sent Thursday January AM To Henry Patricia Subject Stock Option Value On Pay Stub Tricia Have you looked in to the stock option line item on my pay stub yet The number on the stub is about and I think about is accurate Chris

Jon McKay transfer CPPSS agreement Cc PST Ive just sent the application for Jon McKays Canadian Pension Plan US Social Security agreement whereby he will pay us his CPP and not have any SS withheld while working in the US His application is for the period August to September and will not be renewable after that date unless the year limit is changed Normally the approval takes weeks and Ill notify you and send you a copy of the approval letter so you can stop his SS deductions Many thanks Patricia Henry CHRP Enron Canada Human Resources Tel Fax
Re Cooper Richey EXPAT taxesPST Heres my calculation spreadsheet Call if you have any questions Tricia

RE Performance Bonus Cc PST We will remit on December th and he will once again be square on Canadian taxes Thanks Tricia Original Message From Doucet Dawn Sent Monday December PM To Henry Patricia Cc Richey Cooper Slone Jeanie Subject Performance Bonus Tricia Cooper has been paid a bonus in the amount of USD through US payroll Please ensure the appropriate Canadian taxes are calculated and paid on Coopers behalf Thanks
